text: Larry Lee Pressler (born March 29, 1942) is an American politician. He was born in Humboldt, South Dakota and was the United States senator of South Dakota. He served as senator from 1979 to 1997. He was a member of the Republican Party. Pressler ran for President of the United States in 1980, but lost to Ronald Reagan during the primary. Pressler announced in 2013, that he would run for the senate seat as an Independent. He soon lost the election to Republican Governor Mike Rounds. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:1980 United States presidential candidates Category:United States senators from South Dakota Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Larry Pressler
